Best Buy’s best Black Friday 2019 gaming deals
Follow Polygon online:
07 Nov 2019, 16:16 by Emily Heller
Best Buy has a ton of great Black Friday deals for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 games, as well as Xbox One consoles. There’s also a lot of 4K TVs for sale, if you’re in the market for a shiny new TV.
Best Buy’s Black Friday ad preview went out today, showing off a multitude of 4K TVs like the 70-inch Samsung Smart 4K TV with HDR for $549.99, down from $899.99. There’s also a dope PlayStation 4 bundle that includes God of War, Horizon Zero Dawn, and The Last of Us Remastered for $299.99. If you don’t own any of those games, that’s a steal.
We put some of the best Black Friday deals down below, but there’s many more on the Best Buy website. We’ll be updating this post with the freshest deals as they pop up, too.

Select Joy-Cons - $69.99 ($10 off)
Select PowerA controllers - $14.99
Poké Ball Plus - $19.99 ($30 off)
Nintendo Switch with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe bundle - $299.99
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Super Mario Odyssey, Super Mario Party, and Splatoon 2 - $39.99 ($20 off)
Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, Sid Meier’s Civilization 6, and other select titles - $19.99 ($20 off)

God of War, Horizon Zero Dawn: Complete Edition, The Last of Us Remastered, and other select titles - $9.99 ($10 off)

Doorbuster: Xbox One S 1 TB All-Digital Edition Console White - $149.99 ($150 off)

NBA 2K20, Madden NFL 20, and other select games - $27.99
Xbox One controllers - $39.99
Call of Duty: Black Ops 4, Control, and other select titles - $29.99 ($30 off)
Wolfenstein: Youngblood, Just Cause 4, and other select titles - $19.99 ($20 off)
Xbox Game Pass Ultimate 3-month membership - $24.99 ($20 off)
Xbox Live 3-month gold membership - $14.99 ($10 off)

Gaming PC deals

CyberPowerPC Gamer Master Gaming Desktop - $479.99 ($120 off)
HP Omen Obelisk gaming desktop - $899.99 ($350 off)
MSI GeForce GTX 1650 graphics card - $154.99 ($45 off)
AMD Radeon RX 560 GTS graphics card - $169.99 ($50 off)

Headphone, keyboard, and mouse deals

Beats Studio³ Wireless Noise Canceling Headphones Gray - $199.99 ($150 off)
